sub_title: Hoofddocent PO/IDE en Vvz Curriculumcommissie bij Bachelor Engineering at Amsterdam University of Applied Science
summary:
Design Teacher at Amsterdam University of Applied Science, Bachelor Engineering.
Head Teacher of Industrial Design Engineering and Interaction Engineering specialization. 
Chair of Curriculum Committee for Bachelor Engineering department.

Design teacher at Technical University Delft, faculty of Industrial Design Engineering.
Coaching BSc students in design subjects. Contrarian in thought, cooperative in practice.

Creator of online and mobile lighting design tools for indoor and public lighting based on 25 years of lighting industry experience. Full-service integration into any website or app: photometric file conversion, hosting, stats
Creator of EulumdatTools, photometric file workbench based on Eclipse.

Freelance Java Eclipse RCP consultant and developer.
Contributor to Eclipse Mylyn, sloeber.io  and other OSS projects. 

Specialties: new product and service development, industrial design engineering, innovation, lighting, Java, Eclipse RCP, Web App development (front and backend),

treasury_media.title: street-lighting.appspot.com
treasury_media.description: Web based public lighting design for residential areas in accordance with EN13201 and ROVL-2011.

treasury_media.title: How to... using EulumdatTools
treasury_media.description:
Zip, Unzip, verify, manage, view, and edit EULUMDAT and IES files
EULUMDAT is the European standard for photometric data used by all major lighting design programs
IES is the IESNA standard for photometric data used in USA, Asia, ME and Pacific
Verify and calculate LOR, Downward Flux fraction, and Direct Flux Factors
Batch convert IES files to Eulumdat and Eulumdat to IES
Free 30 trial after installation and registration

treasury_media.title: Fast Online Lighting Design - Welcome
treasury_media.description: Calculate instantly the type and quantity of luminaires required. You only enter room size and lighting task, then choose from shortlist. You can offer this service to visitors of your website.

projects.title: lightingCalc
projects.description: lightingCalc allows you to calculate the required number of luminaires of a certain type, based on roomsize, lighting task and some other factors. When happy with solution you can mail or call the supplier. Contains product data for Lumiance, Sylvania, Fagerhult and LUMISSION.

projects.title: JROADS Improved User Interface
projects.description:
JROADS is een TNO simulatie tool voor het simuleren van luchtverdediging en missile defense dat al een aantal jaren bestaat.
Er is een nieuwe client op basis van Eclipse 4 RCP voor definitie en besturing van de simulaties, hier zijn in deze periode een aantal uitbreidingen op gedaan.
Keywords: Java, Eclipse e4 RCP, simulatie, GEF/draw2d

projects.title: Decentrale Selectie IO - TU Delft
projects.description: Decentrale Selectie IO is het proces waarmee de faculteit Industrieel Ontwerpen van de TU Delft uit 200+ aanmeldingen de 50 meest talentvolle ontwerpers selecteert, die vervolgens niet hoeven mee te loten voor de numerus fixus. Ik ben projectleider, verantwoordelijk voor procesontwerp en implementatie, logistiek en uitvoering. Projectteam omvat zo'n 12 personen. Innovaties omvatten: gestroomlijnde online vragenlijst en portfolio samenstelling door kandidaten, ontwikkelen van ICT ondersteuning voor gerandomiseerde, anonieme, horizontale, dubbele beoordeling van alle kandidaten.

projects.title: SLA LiCalc
projects.description:
Calculate the required number of SLA luminaires, mainly new Inpact LED downlighter range, for various applications and room sizes right on your Android phone or tablet. 
Lookup 'Where to buy' information and store for future reference.
Choose product from either mini-catalogue, or popup selector.
Send email or make phone call to selected dealer direct from SLA LiCalc to ask for quotations.
Expert or Simple mode too work efficiently.

company.name: Hogeschool van Amsterdam | Amsterdam University of Applied Sciences

profile_positions.description:
Binnen de brede bachelor Engineering ligt het accent bij de afstudeerrichting Industrial Design Engineering (IDE) op het ontwerpen van producten voor gebruikers, in grote aantallen geproduceerd met accenten circulaire economie, verpakkingen en smart products. Bij Interaction Engineering (IE) ligt het accent op begrijpelijkheid, bruikbaarheid en toegankelijkheid van nieuwe technologie voor iedereen.
https://www.hva.nl/opleidingen/engineering-product-ontwerpen
profile_positions.title: Hoofddocent PO/IDE/IE en Vicevorzitter Curriculumcommisie, Bachelor Engineering, FT

profile_positions.description: FOLD Systems (www.fold1.com) is a leading supplier of software solutions for web based and mobile lighting design tools. Creator of EulumdatTools workbench to manage, edit, convert and verify photometric files.
profile_positions.title: Owner, Web and Mobile Lighting Design Expert

profile_positions.description:
Coaching and teaching students at faculty Industrial Design Engineering (IO) in various subjects: Productontwerpen 1 (introduction), Productontwerpen 2 (concept), ProductOntwerpen 4 (embodiment) Electronics & Interaction, Cross Media Interaction Design, Bachelor Final Project (BEP)
Project Manager for Decentrale Selectie - IO for 2013, 2014 and 2015: selecting and ranking 50 candidates with most "design aptitude" from 200+ applicants.
profile_positions.title: Design Teacher

profile_positions.description:
Supporting the creation of an Eclipse RCP based client front-end to a new generation bagage handling system for Schiphol Airport at IBM´s Aviation Competency Center (ACC).
I work here as an Eclipse RCP consultant helping ACC to better use Eclipse RCP technology.
profile_positions.title: Eclipse RCP Consultant & Trainer

profile_positions.description: Iparix communication BV (formerly SkyberNet professional telecom solutions) was a Dutch telecom start-up, focusing on IP-based data communications services for medium and large companies in The Benelux. Iparix was funded with € 37 million in venture capital.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description: Strategy and marketing plan formulation for Antraciet, a web design agency with 45 employees, based in Bussum, Netherlands.  6 group sessions with strategy team + final report.
profile_positions.title: Freelance Marketing Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Sylvania Lighting International manufactures and sells lamps and fixtures. Concord Lightng and Lumiance are market leaders in their home markets and respected players in Europe.
Responsible for worldwide fixture strategy for all three European fixture manufacturing locations of SLI Inc.: Concord Lighting (Newhaven, U.K.), Lumiance bv (Haarlem, Netherlands), Sylvania (Saint Etienne, France). Combined annual turnover $ 150 mln in 1998.
Tasks include briefing product development in these three factories, liaison with lamp factories, organising product introductions and training. The product range consists about 15000 products for professional lighting applications, and is marketed via national sales organisations in about 30 countries.
profile_positions.title: Product Marketing Director

profile_positions.description: Responsible for post acquisition merging of the four sales organisations of Lumiance bv and Sylvania nv in The Netherlands, Sylvania NV and Lumiance nv in Belgium into one Benelux Sales operation: all communication aspects regarding the merger, defining new commercial policy, merging the customer bases of  Sylvania and Lumiance in Holland.
profile_positions.title: Business Development Manager

profile_positions.description: Manage product life cycle with emphasis on new product development of product portfolio of 2000 professional lighting products.
profile_positions.title: Product Marketing Manager e.a.

profile_positions.description: Manage the design, engineering and production preparation of new tent lighting system for Dutch Army and Marines. 47000 items were produced in this 4 year project.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

volunteer_experiences.description: Representing parents interests in running of this first grade school with about 750 pupils.

Representing school and parent interest in this group of 20+ primary schools in the the Haarlem region. Representing all schools in discussions with school board about supra- and cross-school subjects.
PDMA NL (www.pdma.nl) is the organisation for innovation professionals in the Netherlands and is a chapter of the international Product Development Management Association pdma.org
